title: remix-tests CLIÔºåtoo many logs come out
body:
When I run   "remix-tests test/Decimal_test.sol" , many logs come out before every testcase, just like below, what can I do to remove them?

üëÅ :: Running remix-tests - Unit testing for solidity :: üëÅ

Loading remote solc version v0.6.9+commit.3e3065ac ...
[]
'creation of library remix_tests.sol:Assert pending...'
